name: Elephant Invasion
description:
Elephant Invasion

Elephants are attacking Earth!

You must defend our planet!

Latest Version: 0.1 Alpha

System Requirements:

So what you need to run these FULL HD graphics?

Minimum:

OS: Windows XP/7/8 32 bit or 64 bit

Processor: 0,5 GHz

Memory: 512MB RAM

Support for Linux, Mac OS X, iPhone and Android coming soon!
